title: Logging onto chat service
body: Well after yesterday night my league of legends started this logging onto chat service thing and until now i cant log to the chat so i wanted  to ask if there's any way of solving it like delitting some files or if the repair fix it im repairing right now but let me know if there's any way of fixing it pls also sry for the bad english xD

replies.body: I've seen reports of some players not being able to connect to chat, and something we're looking into.  In the meantime, I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot.  Hopefully, this will help get you back in and chatting with friends!
